name: Bar the Rotter
content:
Bar the Rotter was a male Duros forger and member of the Church of Infinite Perception who had a drinking problem and lived in the Cellar of Penitence on the planet Florrum. He owned a polished stone that he used for meditation on the church's teachings. He worked with Hondo Ohnaka and assisted him during an auction for a fake Maz Kanata's Journal.
Bar the Rotter was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
